table.title: HDMI Hot Plug Detect Implementation Notes

entry.p: Recommend 45 Ohm nominal trace impedance with reasonable noise isolation.
BSS138p or equivalent, 0.85 V < VGS threshold < 1.95 V, input capacitance < 1 nF.
Ensure to follow the vendor data sheet for any additional HPD connectivity requirements.
Refer to Electromagnetic Compatibility chapter (ESD Diode Selection).
